name: La galería de arte
description:
Open-world 3d environment showcasing the power of customizing public digital spaces. A digital art gallery showcasing 6 artists in different mediums. 

Current Artist

Matthew Habrial is a musician, and master of many musical instruments. Blind Choice - Relive Blissr - Say Again Matt - Ernie (Instrumental Jam)

Danial Rivera is a tattoo artist focusing on black and gray style. He is also a master airbrush artist.
